pr_title: Add user ID to Crashlytics reports

timeline.message: Add user ID to Crashlytics reports

timeline.bodyText: This is not problematic, per-se, but consider replacing with a constant time value to make the test deterministic
timeline.author: jakeouellette

replies.bodyText: The value of this timestamp isn't important for this test, we just need one.
replies.author: mrwillis21

timeline.bodyText: These two lines are fine! -- but I think this is where there's an opportunity to instead of calling reportPersistence and passing in a currentSessionId, making a per session-id object that gets persisted by these calls.
timeline.author: jakeouellette

replies.bodyText: Yup, let's chat more about this.
replies.author: mrwillis21
